channel.title: Need help on npc hp and lvls(donu how to explain short)
channel.description:
ok so i have the bonescape 508 source as a base since im new i got alot done but i cnt figure out how to kill a goblin(hes hp atk def and stuf seems like all 99) il post a pick of one killing me with 99 atack str hp ranged http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/138/91554535.png/ ty for reading this>>> :)
now for something els any1 know if i can add custome songs as music to the source like 3doors down for instance?
